item.title: Albert Road: Deliberate littering on street, 7th October
item.description:
If in the area, please clear away the small boxes that are littering the pavement and blowing onto driveways. They are obstacles to the public. Someone deliberately stacked them up on the pavement today. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Albert Road, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish in public area, 7th October
item.description:

item.title: Household rubbish, mattresses and rats, 7th October
item.description:
Please see attached photoâ€™s of Gregory crescent household rubbish, mattresses in front gardens and pavements for months! Pile in front of property number 100 is also housing rats. Gregory Crescent has also other households littered front gardens with unwanted furniture. I am trying to let my property out and have lost revenue of 3 months now as viewing candidates all commented on the environment at Gregory Crescent â€˜lovely house, shame about the areaâ€™. Please resolve the situation as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, Gregory Crescent, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
